description.plain:
Kris Wu, also known by his Chinese name Wu Yi Fan (吴亦凡), is a model, rapper, singer, actor, songwriter, and fashion icon.

His solo work consists mainly of movie and TV show soundtracks, as well as singles “Bad Girl” and “July”. He released a collaboration in 2017 with American rapper Travis Scott, titled “Deserve” making Kris the first Chinese artist to hit #1 on US iTunes Chart. His song, “Like That” became his first single to chart on Billboard Hot 100 at #73, making him the first Chinese artist to achieve that mark.

He is also well known for his participation in the K-Pop boy group EXO and its sub-unit EXO-M from 2012-2014 under Korean label, SM Entertainment.

His solo work consists mainly of movie and TV show soundtracks, as well as singles “Bad Girl” and “July”. He released a collaboration in 2017 with American rapper Travis Scott, titled “Deserve” making Kris the first Chinese artist to hit #1 on US iTunes Chart. His song, “Like That” became his first single to chart on Billboard Hot 100 at #73, making him the first Chinese artist to achieve that mark.

He is also well known for his participation in the K-Pop boy group EXO and its sub-unit EXO-M from 2012-2014 under Korean label, SM Entertainment.

songs.full_title: Deserve by 吴亦凡 (Kris Wu) (Ft. Travis Scott)
songs.title: Deserve

description.plain:
“Deserve” is a single by Kris Wu in collaboration with American rapper, Travis Scott. The track features mellow, harmonizing vocals and raps by the two artists. The song hit #1 on US iTunes Chart upon release making Kris the first Chinese artist to achieve this accomplishment.

Consequently, the track became one of Kris' most successful singles in the USA. It earned Kris his first Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop songs chart entry landing at #44 and a #4 spot on the Billboard Bubbling under Hot 100 chart.

This track was later added to Kris Wu’s debut album, Antares as the 12th track.

songs.title: Juice

description.plain: “Juice” is Kris Wu (aka Wu Yi-Fan)’s first released track of of 2017, and second single purely in English. However, whilst “July” gave a psychedelic, contemporary R&B vibe with romantic lyrics, this song features a harder-hitting hip-hop instrumental over which Kris affirms his status in the music industry.

songs.title: JULY

description.plain:
‘July’ was released on the 4th of November as early present to Wu’s fans to celebrate the singer’s 26th birthday. He has made it a tradition to release a single on his birthday, last year’s release being “Bad Girl”.

The song features an eclectic mix of electro R&B, EDM & Future Bass elements. When asked backstage at his Mr. Fantastic Birthday Concert why the single is titled ‘July’, Wu replied he wanted his fans to feel warmth through the song despite it being winter in China at the time of release. He can also imagine it being quite suitable for the summer, listening to it whilst driving to an outing.
